description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- Improvement: Improved PDF importers for flatexDEGIRO, Postbank, Deutsche Bank, and DirectaSIM.
- Improvement: Interactive Brokers Flex Query (IBFlex) now supports additional date and time formats.
- Improvement: Added a dedicated submenu for selecting the reporting period when coloring the tree map by performance.
- Fix: Prevented deletion of the main node in taxonomies.
- Fix: Fixed an issue with filtering search results for new instruments by currency or type.
